mapper.select: select id, user_md5, unique_id, name, ip, count, todaycount, today_effectcount, user_status, user_todaystatus, update_time, create_time from lihao.jd_mobilecity where id = #{id}
select id, user_md5, unique_id, name, ip, count, todaycount, today_effectcount, user_status, user_todaystatus, update_time, create_time from lihao.jd_mobilecity limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into lihao.jd_mobilecity(user_md5, unique_id, name, ip, count, todaycount, today_effectcount, user_status, user_todaystatus, update_time, create_time) values (#{userMd5}, #{uniqueId}, #{name}, #{ip}, #{count}, #{todaycount}, #{todayEffectcount}, #{userStatus}, #{userTodaystatus}, #{updateTime}, #{createTime})

insert into lihao.jd_mobilecity(user_md5, unique_id, name, ip, count, todaycount, today_effectcount, user_status, user_todaystatus, update_time, create_time) values
(#{entity.userMd5}, #{entity.uniqueId}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.count}, #{entity.todaycount}, #{entity.todayEffectcount}, #{entity.userStatus}, #{entity.userTodaystatus}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createTime})

insert into lihao.jd_mobilecity(user_md5, unique_id, name, ip, count, todaycount, today_effectcount, user_status, user_todaystatus, update_time, create_time) values
(#{entity.userMd5}, #{entity.uniqueId}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.count}, #{entity.todaycount}, #{entity.todayEffectcount}, #{entity.userStatus}, #{entity.userTodaystatus}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createTime})
on duplicate key update user_md5 = values(user_md5) , unique_id = values(unique_id) , name = values(name) , ip = values(ip) , count = values(count) , todaycount = values(todaycount) , today_effectcount = values(today_effectcount) , user_status = values(user_status) , user_todaystatus = values(user_todaystatus) , update_time = values(update_time) , create_time = values(create_time)
mapper.update:
update lihao.jd_mobilecity
user_md5 = #{userMd5},
unique_id = #{uniqueId},
name = #{name},
ip = #{ip},
count = #{count},
todaycount = #{todaycount},
today_effectcount = #{todayEffectcount},
user_status = #{userStatus},
user_todaystatus = #{userTodaystatus},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
where id = #{id}
